executive_summary: Implementation of Galaxy Defender as a pure HTML/CSS/JavaScript client-side game featuring a rocket ship that follows mouse cursor horizontally while avoiding falling asteroids and UFOs, collecting stars for points. The game includes progressive difficulty scaling and collision detection for game over conditions.

tasks.description: Create HTML structure and basic CSS styling
tasks.requirements: Set up the main HTML file with canvas element for game rendering, basic CSS for layout and styling including space theme background
tasks.test_criteria: HTML file loads properly with visible canvas and space-themed styling

tasks.description: Initialize game canvas and basic JavaScript structure
tasks.requirements: Set up canvas context, game loop structure, and basic game state management
tasks.test_criteria: Canvas initializes properly and game loop runs without errors

tasks.description: Implement player rocket entity with mouse following
tasks.requirements: Create rocket entity (🚀) that follows mouse cursor horizontally only, constrained to canvas boundaries
tasks.test_criteria: Rocket appears on screen and smoothly follows mouse horizontal movement

tasks.requirements: Implement system to spawn asteroids (☄️), UFOs (🛸), and stars (⭐) that fall from top of screen at high speed
tasks.test_criteria: Objects spawn randomly at top and fall down at appropriate speeds

tasks.requirements: Detect collisions between player rocket and all falling objects using bounding box or circle collision
tasks.test_criteria: Collisions are accurately detected between rocket and all object types

tasks.description: Add scoring system for star collection
tasks.requirements: Award 50 points when player collects a star, display current score on screen
tasks.test_criteria: Score increases by 50 when rocket touches star, score is visible on screen

tasks.description: Implement game over on asteroid/UFO collision
tasks.requirements: End game immediately when player touches asteroid or UFO, show game over screen with final score
tasks.test_criteria: Game ends when rocket touches asteroid or UFO, game over screen displays

tasks.requirements: Increase game speed every 10 seconds to make objects fall faster and spawn more frequently
tasks.test_criteria: Game becomes noticeably faster every 10 seconds of gameplay

tasks.requirements: Allow player to restart game after game over, reset all game state variables
tasks.test_criteria: Player can restart game from game over screen, all values reset properly

tasks.requirements: Optimize rendering, add smooth animations, ensure consistent frame rate, add visual feedback
tasks.test_criteria: Game runs smoothly at 60fps with no performance issues

file_structure.description: Simple client-side structure with HTML for layout, CSS for styling, and JavaScript for game logic
